name: forge-java-starter
description: A dApp starter that integrates forge-java-sdk and create-react-app and works with ABT Wallet
author: huangshan <shan@arcblock.io> https://github.com/PaperHS

install-scripts.install-dependencies: git init && git submodule add --force https://github.com/arcblock/Forge-java-demo.git ./templates/server && git submodule update --remote ./templates/server/ && yarn install
